name: Li'l Red
description:
Deep within the Marigold Meadows held the Radiant Lily, a mythical herb capable of dispelling any toxin. Upon finding this Lily, Lyra ventures through Florian to deliver the herb to the country of Clerica. Hop through 4 areas in this 2D platformer adventure and face off against goons and bosses alike by using Lyra's harp based attacks.
Using her trusty spin jump, Lyra is able to weave through enemies without taking contact damage whilst she journeys back home. By diving onto slopes, Lyra can gain a burst of speed when she jumps.


Joining Lyra are her loyal animal friends, Lepus, Felis, and Columba. By using Muse Points (MP) she is able to call upon her allies and combat foes who are beyond her reach. Although Lyra's MP pool is modest, she can refill her MP by landing physical attacks.


Featuring the iconic LCD palette from the 1990s. Choose between 11 color palettes to change a playthrough from a calm sunset to a deep midnight. Adding to this is an 8-bit classic soundtrack to complement the familiar green screen aesthetic. Strive for S ranks and quicker times with a refreshing new look for the game.
